Aatrox.ability_text: Transform for 10/10/30 seconds, gaining 15% Omnivamp. While transformed, attacks deal 275%/275%/2500% physical damage.

origin_details.Darkin:
When Aatrox or the holder of the Darkin Blade dies, the Darkin Blade is equipped to the nearest allied champion, granting them 400 Health and 15% Omnivamp.

After being equipped to a champion for 4 seconds, Aatrox will revive upon their death instead.

class_details.Juggernaut:
Juggernaut champions take less damage as their Health decreases.

2: 10% to 25% damage reduction
4: 20% to 40% damage reduction
6: 30% to 50% damage reduction
class_details.Slayer:
Slayers gain 12% Omnivamp.
Slayers deal bonus damage, doubled against units below 60% Health.

2: +5% bonus damage
3: +10% bonus damage
4: +25% bonus damage
5: +35% bonus damage
6: +50% bonus damage

Ahri.ability_text:
Steal essence from enemies around the current target, dealing 115/170/1000 magic damage and Mana Reaving them.
Every 3/3/1 casts, unleash a wave that deals 250/375/3000 magic damage to all enemies hit. This deals 33% more damage to enemies whose essence has been stolen.

Ionia Bonus: +3 Mana per second.

origin_details.Ionia:
Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability.
Every 4 seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining 20 mana and doubling stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

3: 100% Ionian bonus, 1 enlightened
6: 200% Ionian bonus, 2 enlightened
9: 325% Ionian bonus, 3 enlightened

class_details.Sorcerer:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.
When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

2: 25 AP, 10% max HP
4: 50 AP, 15% max HP
6: 85 AP, 15% max HP to 2 enemies
8: 125 AP, 20% max HP to 2 enemies

Akshan.ability_text: Lock on to the farthest enemy and unleash a hail of 6 shots toward them. Each deals 101/157/243 physical damage to the first enemy hit.

origin_details.Shurima:
Every 4 seconds, Shurimans heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain 25% maximum Health and 35% Attack Speed.

3: The strongest Shuriman Ascends
5: All Shurimans Ascend
7: All Ascend at the Start of Combat, boosts Ascension bonuses by +20%
9: +25% Ascension bonus, Ascends a second time after 8 seconds

class_details.Deadeye:
Innate: +1 Range
Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

2: +20% damage
4: +65% damage
6: +150% damage

Aphelios.ability_text:
Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals 120/180/743 physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

For 7 seconds, equip 3 Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast. Attacks deal 8/8/40% bonus physical damage for each Chakram equipped. Aphelios heals for 50% of damage dealt by Chakrams.

origin_details.Targon:
All of your units' healing and shielding is improved.

2: 20% increased healing and shielding
3: 40% increased healing and shielding
4: 70% increased healing and shielding

class_details.Deadeye:
Innate: +1 Range
Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

2: +20% damage
4: +65% damage
6: +150% damage

Ashe.ability_text:
Fire 8 arrows in a cone, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for a few seconds.

Damage : 150% / 150% / 160% AD

origin_details.Freljord:
After 7 seconds, an ice storm strikes the battlefield. Enemies take a percentage of their maximum Health as true damage and gain debuffs.

2: 5% Health, enemies are 40% Sundered and Shredded for 15 seconds
3: 10% Health, enemies are also 30% Mana Reaved
4: 15% Health, enemies are also stunned for 1.5 seconds

Innate: +1 Range
Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

2: +20% damage
4: +65% damage
6: +150% damage

Azir.ability_text:
Passive: Every third attack, a Sand Soldier deals 95/140/500 magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. If Azir already has 3 Soldiers, they all immediately deal 67/98/350 magic damage instead.

origin_details.Shurima:
Every 4 seconds, Shurimans heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain 25% maximum Health and 35% Attack Speed.

3: The strongest Shuriman Ascends
5: All Shurimans Ascend
7: All Ascend at the Start of Combat, boosts Ascension bonuses by +20%
9: +25% Ascension bonus, Ascends a second time after 8 seconds

class_details.Strategist:
Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a Shield for 15 seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

2: 200 Shield, 15 AP
3: 350 Shield, 25 AP
4: 500 Shield, 40 AP
5: 800 Shield, 60 AP

Bel'Veth.ability_text: Lash out at the lowest Health enemy in range 6/6/30 times. Each lash deals 76/114/177 physical damage and 2% of the target's max Health as true damage.

origin_details.Void:
Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies.
Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by 25%.

3: Void Remora
6: Rift Herald
8: Baron Nashor

class_details.Empress:
When Bel'Veth kills an enemy, they leave behind Void Coral that she will consume. The first Coral increases her maximum Health by 50%, while further Coral heals her 20% maximum Health.

When a Void Coral is consumed, she deals 10% maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Cassiopeia.ability_text: Deal 170/255/385 magic damage to the current target and Wound them for 5 seconds. If they are already Wounded, deal 60/90/135 bonus magic damage.

origin_details.Noxus:
Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 10% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

3: 160 Health, 16 AP, 16% AD
6: 280 Health, 28 AP, 28% AD
9: 420 Health, 42 AP, 42% AD
origin_details.Shurima:
Every 4 seconds, Shurimans heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain 25% maximum Health and 35% Attack Speed.

9: +25% Ascension bonus, Ascends a second time after 8 seconds

Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

2: 5 Mana
4: Additional 15 Mana to Invokers
6: 20 Mana to all, additional 15 Mana to Invokers

Cho'Gath.ability_text: Deal 334/486/722 magic damage to the lowest Health enemy in range. If this kills them, devour them and permanently gain 30/35/40 maximum Health.

Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies.
Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by 25%.

3: Void Remora
6: Rift Herald

class_details.Bruiser:
Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

Darius.ability_text: Deal 345/488/701 physical damage to the current target. If they die, immediately cast this again with 82/85/90% damage.

Ekko.ability_text: Heal 20% of damage taken in the last 4 seconds and deal 290/435/710 magic damage to the current target.

origin_details.Piltover:
Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex.
You may also sell the T-Hex if it has any Power, resetting the T-Hex and converting its Power to loot.

3: Gain the T-Hex.
6: Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.
origin_details.Zaun:
Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can only be removed by selling the champion.

2: Gain 1 chem-mod
4: Gain 2 chem-mods
6: Gain 3 chem-mods and Overcharge them

class_details.Rogue:
2: When a Rogue falls below 50% Health, they briefly become untargetable and dash to an enemy within 4 hexes (preferring enemy backline).
4: Additionally, a Rogue's first attack on an enemy bleeds them for 40% of their max Health as magic damage over 5 seconds.

Galio.ability_text: Reduce damage taken by 20%/20%/25% and heal for 350/400/450 over 4 seconds. After, deal 200/300/450 magic damage to adjacent enemies.

origin_details.Demacia:
Your strongest Demacians become Elite and equip a random Radiant item each combat. Elites grant Armor and Magic Resist to themselves and adjacent allies, but this does not stack.

3: 1 Elite, +5 AR and MR
5: 2 Elite, +25 AR and MR
7: 3 Elite, +60 AR and MR
9: 5 Elite, +125 AR and MR

2: +20 AR and MR
4: +50 AR and MR
6: +100 AR and MR
8: +240 AR and MR
class_details.Yordle:
Your units gain 10% Attack Speed per star level.
If you have three 3-star champions, your Yordles can become 4-star, which gives their Ability a wacky upgrade!

3: Your strongest 3-star Yordle
5: Two 3-star Yordles

Rek'Sai.ability_text:
Deal 195/293/461 physical damage to the current target. If they are below 70% Health, deal 234/351/553 true damage instead.
If this kills the target, rip through them 1 hex and heal for 10% of max health.

origin_details.Void:
Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies.
Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by 25%.

3: Void Remora
6: Rift Herald
8: Baron Nashor

class_details.Bruiser:
Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

2: +10% max HP
4: +40% max HP
6: +70% max HP

Renekton.ability_text: Deal 180/270/400 magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal 220/270/320 for the first enemy hit and another 30 for each additional one.

origin_details.Shurima:
Every 4 seconds, Shurimans heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain 25% maximum Health and 35% Attack Speed.

3: The strongest Shuriman Ascends
5: All Shurimans Ascend
7: All Ascend at the Start of Combat, boosts Ascension bonuses by +20%
9: +25% Ascension bonus, Ascends a second time after 8 seconds

class_details.Bruiser:
Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

2: +10% max HP
4: +40% max HP
6: +70% max HP

Ryze.ability_text: Ryze's ability changes depending on the portal the lobby chooses at the beginning of the game.

origin_details.Wanderer: Wanderers spell changes depending on the Region Portal players voted for at the start of the game.

class_details.Invoker:
Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

2: 5 Mana
4: Additional 15 Mana to Invokers
6: 20 Mana to all, additional 15 Mana to Invokers

Samira.ability_text: Shoot at the current target and deal 175% Attack Damage to the first enemy hit. Reduce their Armor by 10/15/20 for the rest of combat.

origin_details.Noxus:
Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 10% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

3: 160 Health, 16 AP, 16% AD
6: 280 Health, 28 AP, 28% AD
9: 420 Health, 42 AP, 42% AD

class_details.Challenger:
Challengers gain bonus Attack Speed. When their target dies, Challengers dash to a new target and increase their Attack Speed bonus by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

2: 30% AS
4: 60% AS
6: 95% AS
8: 140% AS

Sejuani.ability_text:
Passive: Whenever an ally attacks a Chilled enemy, they deal 1.5/1.5/10% bonus true damage.

Active: Gain 600/700/2000 Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 160/240/1200 magic damage to nearby enemies and Chill them for 4 seconds.

origin_details.Freljord:
After 7 seconds, an ice storm strikes the battlefield. Enemies take a percentage of their maximum Health as true damage and gain debuffs.

2: 5% Health, enemies are 40% Sundered and Shredded for 15 seconds
3: 10% Health, enemies are also 30% Mana Reaved
4: 15% Health, enemies are also stunned for 1.5 seconds

class_details.Bruiser:
Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

2: +10% max HP
4: +40% max HP
6: +70% max HP

Senna.ability_text: Fire a massive beam at the furthest enemy, dealing 124/195/2925 physical damage to all enemies hit. Any allies hit gain 250/325/4000 Shield for 4/4/15 seconds.

origin_details.Shadow Isles:
After dealing or receiving damage 10 times, Shadow Isles champions gain a Shield for 15 seconds and become Spectral for the rest of combat. Spectral champions gain Mana every second.

2: 40% HP Shield, 5 Mana
4: 70% HP Shield, 10 Mana
6: 111% HP Shield, 15 Mana

class_details.Gunner:
When Gunner champions attack, they gain bonus Attack Damage, up to 8 stacks.

2: 6% AD per stack
4: 11% AD per stack
6: 20% AD per stack
class_details.Redeemer: Whenever an ally gains a Shield, Senna grants them 8% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Sett.ability_text:
Grab an enemy from either side and slam them together, knocking them up. Deals 200/300/465 magic damage and Stuns them for 1/2/2 seconds.
If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.

Ionia Bonus: +200 maximum Health.

origin_details.Ionia:
Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability.
Every 4 seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining 20 mana and doubling stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

3: 100% Ionian bonus, 1 enlightened
6: 200% Ionian bonus, 2 enlightened
9: 325% Ionian bonus, 3 enlightened

class_details.Juggernaut:
Juggernaut champions take less damage as their Health decreases.

2: 10% to 25% damage reduction
4: 20% to 40% damage reduction
6: 30% to 50% damage reduction

Shen.ability_text:
Gain 240/360/2000 Shield and grant 275/350/1800 Shield to the 2 lowest-Health allies for 4 seconds. After shielding his allies, Shen's Shield refreshes with a burst, dealing 225/355/1600 magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Ionia Bonus: +10% Damage Reduction.

origin_details.Ionia:
Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability.
Every 4 seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining 20 mana and doubling stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

3: 100% Ionian bonus, 1 enlightened
6: 200% Ionian bonus, 2 enlightened
9: 325% Ionian bonus, 3 enlightened

Sion.ability_text:
Passive: Upon death, reanimate with 100% Health, decaying at 12/8/0% maximum Health per second. Sion can no longer use his Ability, but is immune to crowd control and gains 2/2/10 Attack Speed.

Active: Charge towards the most enemies within 4 hexes. Deal 158/247/788 physical damage to any enemies along the way and knock them up, Stunning them for 1/2/15 seconds.

origin_details.Noxus:
Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 10% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

6: 280 Health, 28 AP, 28% AD

2: +10% max HP
4: +40% max HP
6: +70% max HP

Sona.ability_text: Send a wave of sound at the largest clump of enemies and deal 105/155/255 magic damage to enemies hit. Allies hit by the wave gain 30/35/40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

origin_details.Demacia:
Your strongest Demacians become Elite and equip a random Radiant item each combat. Elites grant Armor and Magic Resist to themselves and adjacent allies, but this does not stack.

3: 1 Elite, +5 AR and MR
5: 2 Elite, +25 AR and MR
7: 3 Elite, +60 AR and MR
9: 5 Elite, +125 AR and MR

class_details.Multicaster:
Multicasters cast their Ability multiple times. Bonus casts have 50% reduced effectiveness.

2: 1 extra cast
4: 2 extra casts

Soraka.ability_text:
Heal the lowest health ally for 170/190/220 . If the ally is below 40% Health, heal them for an additional 100/120/140.

Over the next 5 seconds, 5 stars hit the enemy closest to them. Each deals 115/170/265 magic damage.

origin_details.Targon:
All of your units' healing and shielding is improved.

2: 20% increased healing and shielding
3: 40% increased healing and shielding
4: 70% increased healing and shielding

Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

2: 5 Mana
4: Additional 15 Mana to Invokers
6: 20 Mana to all, additional 15 Mana to Invokers

Swain.ability_text: Transform and gain 450/475/500 max Health for 5 seconds. While transformed, deal 25/40/60 magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 10% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

class_details.Sorcerer:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.
When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

2: 25 AP, 10% max HP
4: 50 AP, 15% max HP
6: 85 AP, 15% max HP to 2 enemies
8: 125 AP, 20% max HP to 2 enemies
class_details.Strategist:
Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a Shield for 15 seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

2: 200 Shield, 15 AP
3: 350 Shield, 25 AP
4: 500 Shield, 40 AP
5: 800 Shield, 60 AP

Taliyah.ability_text:
Passive: Whenever an enemy is knocked up or back by anything, throw a boulder towards them. It deals 125/190/290 magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal 150/225/350 magic damage to your target and knock them up, Stunning them for 2 seconds.

Tristana.ability_text:
Gain 70% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. For the duration, attacks explode on impact and deal 18/27/41/54 physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.

4-Star Upgrade: Every 10th attack deals 45/68/101/135 bonus physical damage and ricochets to the largest clump of enemies, dealing 23/34/51/68 physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.

Urgot.ability_text:
Passive: Whenever an enemy enters Attack Range, fire a blast from the leg facing that direction that deals 243/364/933 physical damage. Each of Urgot's 6 legs has a 4/4/1 second cooldown.

Active: Gain 375/450/1200 Shield for 5 seconds and dash behind the current target. Reset all leg cooldowns.

origin_details.Zaun:
Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can only be removed by selling the champion.

2: Gain 1 chem-mod
4: Gain 2 chem-mods
6: Gain 3 chem-mods and Overcharge them

class_details.Deadeye:
Innate: +1 Range
Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

2: +20% damage
4: +65% damage
6: +150% damage

Vel'Koz.ability_text: Fire a plasma bolt towards the current target that deals 190/285/470 magic damage to the first enemy hit. It then splits in two, dealing 50% less damage whenever it passes through an enemy.

Vi.ability_text: Gain 325/350/400 Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 120/180/270 physical damage to enemies within 1 hex of the current target and 40% Sunder them for 4 seconds.

origin_details.Piltover:
Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex.
You may also sell the T-Hex if it has any Power, resetting the T-Hex and converting its Power to loot.

3: Gain the T-Hex.
6: Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.

class_details.Rogue:
2: When a Rogue falls below 50% Health, they briefly become untargetable and dash to an enemy within 4 hexes (preferring enemy backline).
4: Additionally, a Rogue's first attack on an enemy bleeds them for 40% of their max Health as magic damage over 5 seconds.
